summary:
Bing is a search engine created by Microsoft. It was launched in 2009, replacing Microsoft's older search engines. Bing provides various search options like web, video, image, and maps. It introduced helpful features like suggested searches and an 'Explore pane'. Over time, Bing has improved with open-source technology and now has an AI chatbot called Microsoft Copilot.

Bing is the second most popular search engine globally, after Google. It has a market share of about 3.64%, and its technology is also used in Yahoo! Search.
title: Microsoft Bing
